content.question: Which of the following claims can best be made about spirituals and hymns such as “Lift Every Voice and Sing”?

choices.label: They conveyed the assertion that African Americans should be accepted as equals.
They encouraged African Americans to use music as a means of assimilation.
They offered uplifting messages of redemption and deliverance.
They were used to promote solidarity between African Americans and other oppressed groups.

content.answer: They offered uplifting messages of redemption and deliverance.

skill.text: 3.B: Support a claim or argument using specific and relevant evidence.
